name: Double Dungeon (grizeldi, negdo, ImTheRedDevil, PickyDogFish)
description:
What if you tried to crawl dungeons, but had to control 2 characters at the same time? What if you had to pay attention so not one, but two of your characters don't get overwhelmed by monsters? Find out the answers to all that and more in Double Dungeon.

Overview

Double Dungeon is a simple, but hard dungeon crawler, where you control 2 characters while going around exploring the dungeon. Try to go as deep into the dungeon as you can while fighting monsters and solving simple box puzzles.

Created in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Controls and How to Play

Check out the official instructions manual here (also available ingame).

Installation

Extract the downloaded zip and run the executable. On Linux a "chmod +x" might be required on the extracted executable.

Credits
  • ImTheRedDevil - programming
  • PickyDogFish - level design, concept art, searching for sound effects
  • negdo - 3D art
  • grizeldi - project lead, animation importing, VFX, programming, whatever else needed doing
  • freesound.org for sound effects
  • freepd.com for music
  • mixamo for base main character animations
